skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the Monitor Abercrombie. My sister and I used to help with shore bombardment around the Mediterranean Sea. Tee hee~ It's way more fun to shoot stationary targets~
skins.acquisition: Take THIS! 每 Oh, Commander? Tee hee~ I'm Abercrombie! Lovely weather today, eh~?
skins.login: That loud bang? Tee hee~ You were gone for so long I was getting bored, so I let a shot loose~
skins.details: It's so much fun to fire my gun~!
skins.secretaryIdle1: My hobby's collecting shell casings~! Hey, don't you think shell casings are super cool?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Top of the mornin', granny Hood!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Whuaah! Hey, Wales! Granny Hood is giving me creepy looks~!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, want some crisps? Here you go! ... Roberts, come here! I found the crook who ate your crisps!

skins.shipDescription: Kabooom! You thought it was a pumpkin, but it was me, Abercrombie, with my Mark I! Commander, did I scare you senseless? Muahaha!
skins.acquisition: Kabooom! You thought it was a pumpkin, but it was me, Abercrombie, with my Mark I! Commander, did I scare you senseless? Muahaha!
skins.login: Tee hee~ Who knows where I've planted my pumpkin surprise~
skins.details: Trick or treat! Give me candy, or you'll taste one of my pranks! Although, even if you give me some... well, you'll see for yourself! Tee hee~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Take a gander at my Halloween Mark I! Looks cracking, doesn't it!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Nelson's wearing a Halloween costume?! Really?! Let me have a look at it, Commander!
skins.secretaryIdle3: If only we had more holidays where you could cause mischief and get away with it scot-free~
skins.secretaryTouch: Shake hands with my Halloween Mark I! Come on, Mark I, show the Commander your special trick~!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Taste the retribution of my Mark I! (Pow!)
